name: Two-Weapon Feint

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 15, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Two-Weapon Fighting.

sections.body: While using Two-Weapon Fighting to make melee attacks, you can forgo your first primary-hand melee attack to make a Bluff check to feint an opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You use one weapon to distract your enemy while slipping another past his defenses.
